name: Project Power (Malgios)
description:
Defeat evil robots with lightning abilities.

Charge machines with your power to gain benefits.

Game for the Mini Jam 73: Power. 

Limitation: Only 5 colors.

Use the downloadable version for the best experience.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Lightning: left mouse button

Credits:

Game: Malgios

Music: "Cut and Run" by Kevin MacLeod
